full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG LUS DKYIL GYI SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(CES GRUB CHEN DRIL BU LUGS KYI DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA LUS DKYIL GYI SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPRANG BTZUN SNYOMS LAS MKHAN BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOR 'BOD PAS, ,GRUB MCHOG DBEN SA PA CHEN PO BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYIS MDZAD PA PHRI BSNAN DANG TSIG GI BSGYUR KHA CUNG ZAD REM @020B GTOGS GSUNG SOR BZHAG DANG, ,BRGYUD 'DEBS DANG SMON SHIS MDOR BSDUS RNAMS BDAG GI BKA' DRIN GSUM LDAN GYI RTZA BA'I BLA MA KHRI CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG RGYAN MTSAN SENG GE'I GSUNG GIS KHA BSKANGS TE, ,RANG GI KHA TON DU BSGRIGS PA 'DIS KYANG, ,TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU LHA MCHOG 'DI NYID KYIS RJES SU 'DZIN CING, ,MCHOG THUN GYI DNGOS GRUB 'GRUB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,` MANG THOS SGRUB LA GZHOL BA'I BYA BTANG BA, ,BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGES, ,BLA MA 'KHOR LO SDOM PAS RJES BZUNG NAS, ,RIM GNYIS MTHAR PHYIN ZUNG 'JUG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
